comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Half of an identical-twin act, Jenny "Yancsi" Dolly and her sister Rosie (Roszika) Dolly performed as dancers on Vaudeville. Yancsi's name comes from her birthname, Janszieka Deutsch. The Dolly Sisters were born in 1892 in Hungary. Jenny had a sad later life, in a car accident with her lover Max Constant, multiple surgeries to restore her looks, and finally death by suicide in 1941. www.imdb.com/name/nm0231184/bio

comment.author: 37149688@N08
comment._content: I thought I'd share something I read about identical twins the other day--but I cannot cite a reference for the trivia. Two boys are called "fraternal" twins, while two girls are called "sororital" twins, both terms derived from fraternity and sorority.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
